nodes.text: Farr Orjul was a Human male Separatist terrorist and a supplier of explosives ordnance for Perrive's terror net on Coruscant. He was apprehended by Omega Squad during a TIOPS mission and was interrogated by Walon Vau and Etain Tur-Mukan. During Etain's first attempt to extract information from him with a simple mind trick, he spat in her face, and instead she broke down his will enough for Vau finish the job. After extracting as much information from Orjul as he could, Vau killed Orjul and his two terrorist accomplices, Gysk and M'truli.
